meaning: (상)의 ▶ agricultural chemistry 농예 화학 ▶ an agricultural (experimental) station 농업 시험장 ▶ an agricultural show 농산물 품평회agricultural·ly ▷ ágriculture
details:
ag·ri·cul·tur·al〔ægrikʌltʃər∂l〕 a. 농업의, 농사[농예]의, 농학(상)의

▶ an agricultural (experimental) station 농업 시험장
